title: EastEnders spoilers: Panesar family connected to someone in Walford
text:
The Panesar clan have already caused plenty of trouble in EastEnders — and they haven’t moved in yet! — but, in the coming episodes, they show up in Walford once more‚ and their arrival brings with it a huge question — as it appears that they might be familiar with someone already living in Albert Square.

Kheerat (Jaz Deol) and Jags (Amar Adatia) showed up in Walford several weeks back when they realised that Ben Mitchell (Max Bowden) was responsible for the former’s car having gone missing. Upon tracking him down, the siblings issued Ben with a stern warning, and it became clear rather quickly that you wouldn’t want to mess with these guys!

In the coming episodes, the family arrive in Walford, and — when Ben gets wind of their arrival — he proceeds to confront them.

However, the Mitchell lad is soon left embarrassed when he realises that they’re not actually there to see him — a revelation which begs the question of who exactly they are there to visit?

Advertisement

Advertisement

Later, Jags recognises a familiar face while in Walford — but who is it?

It seems as if the Panesars might have connections in Albert Square — which could perhaps end up being the reason the three characters start to appear in the soap more frequently.

However, who those connections are have yet to be revealed.

One to watch: Tuesday 29th October at 8pm on BBC One.
